entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
